Text:
when i install the game it doesnt work, at 99% with the voice pack the installation stops working and i have to shut it down because it wont do anything..

pls help me

@ brredfan

I had the same problem. 
1. you can fix it by closing the installation at 99%. 
2. After that go to the imagefile (the .iso file)  and go to GameData. Copy the file Voice.pak and the other files. 
3. paste the files in the intallation folder of the game.
4. overwrite all.
5. Play end Enjoy ;)
